sentences.en: Cleaning the light is simplicity itself; just wipe it with a cloth.

sentences.en: He could wipe the floor with the Prime Minister.

sentences.cn: 他用袖子擦掉玻璃上凝结的水珠。

sentences.en: Only in this way can we wipe out the enemy troops.
sentences.cn: 只有这样我们才能消灭敌军.

sentences.en: Please wipe your feet on the mat.

sentences.en: Wipe off any excess make-up with a clean, moist cotton flannel.
sentences.cn: 用干净的湿绒布擦去多余的化妆品。

sentences.en: Wipe the jam off my mouth, will you?

sentences.en: Wipe the mushrooms clean and thread them on a string.
sentences.cn: 把这些蘑菇擦干净，然后用线穿起来。

sentences.en: Wipe your feet on the mat before you come in, please.
